analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and address the issues causing this failure to ensure a smooth user experience.
insights: The homepage has the fastest load time (489 ms) among all pages, suggesting that its optimizations are effective. Use the homepage as a benchmark for optimizing other pages.
The pricing page has the longest TTFB (255.6 ms), which might be due to server-side processing or database queries. Investigating and optimizing these factors can significantly improve TTFB.
The blog page has a slightly higher FCP (388 ms) compared to the other pages. Consider optimizing above-the-fold content or lazy-loading images to further reduce FCP.
